event.title: Clock
event.name: Cycles
event.description: The number of core clock cycles

event.title: Software
event.name: Increment
event.description: Software increment. The register is incremented only on writes to the Software Increment Register.

event.title: Cache
event.name: Instruction refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a refill of at least the level of instruction or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Inst TLB refill
event.description: Instruction fetch that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a refill of at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data access
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a cache access to at least the level of data or unified cache closest to the processor

event.title: Cache
event.name: Data TLB refill
event.description: Memory Read or Write operation that causes a TLB refill of at least the level of TLB closest to the processor

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Data Read
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass - load

event.title: Instruction
event.name: Memory write
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass - store

event.title: Branch
event.name: PC change
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, software change of the PC

event.title: Procedure
event.name: Return
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition code check pass, procedure return

event.title: Memory
event.name: Unaligned access
event.description: Instruction architecturally executed, condition check pass, unaligned load or store

event.title: Branch
event.name: Mispredicted
event.description: Mispredicted or not predicted branch speculatively executed

event.title: Branch
event.name: Potential prediction
event.description: Branch or other change in program flow that could have been predicted by the branch prediction resources of the processor

event.title: Memory
event.name: Write stall
event.description: Data Write operation that stalls the pipeline because the store buffer is full

event.title: Memory
event.name: Snoop
event.description: SCU Snooped data from another CPU for this CPU

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 inst error
event.description: L1 Instruction Cache (data or tag) memory error

event.title: Cache
event.name: L1 data error
event.description: L1 Data Cache (data, tag or dirty) memory error, correctable or non-correctable

event.title: Stall
event.name: DPU IP empty
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle that the DPU IQ is empty and that is not because of a recent micro-TLB miss, instruction cache miss or pre-decode error.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Cache miss
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction cache miss being processed.

event.title: Stall
event.name: TLB miss
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is an instruction micro-TLB miss being processed.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Pre-decode error
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle the DPU IQ is empty and there is a pre-decode error being processed.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Interlock other
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is not because of an Advanced SIMD or Floating-point instruction, and not because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Interlock address
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of a load/store instruction waiting for data to calculate the address in the AGU. Stall cycles because of a stall in Wr, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Interlock SIMD/FPU
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle there is an interlock that is because of an Advanced SIMD or Floating-point instruction. Stall cycles because of a stall in the Wr stage, typically awaiting load data, are excluded.

event.title: Stall
event.name: Load miss
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a load miss

event.title: Stall
event.name: Store
event.description: Attributable Performance Impact Event. Counts every cycle there is a stall in the Wr stage because of a store.
